skillTree.localised_description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from all of their years spent barking orders at their ship.

effects.description: Effect range: +30% for "Avast Ye!" and "All Hands Hoay!"
Cooldown: -50% to "Avast Ye!" and "All Hands Hoay!"

skillTree.localised_description: This Captain never sails sober. The sea goes one way, Captain goes the other. Makes the rockin' bearable.

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Grog Carriers units
	(Lord's army)

Effect range: +50% for "Liquid Encouragement" for Grog Carriers units

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: "I'd rather give my tenth coin to Ranald than risk losing the remaining nine."

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Fire, to destroy all that you have done; fire, to end all you've become.
Such methods are blunt and crude in the extreme, but still very, very effective.

effects.description:
Enemy casualty replenishment rate: -10%
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: If there's duty to be paid, rest assured that this one will find a way around it.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: The beasts of the world belong to everyone, never a single individual.

effects.description:
Leadership: -8 for enemy monstrous units

Missile resistance: -10% for enemy monstrous units
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Why would one pretend to be what he is not? There are many reasons, none of them innocent.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: If you're offering enough, most people eventually start to see things your way.

effects.description:
Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors
	(Heroes in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: "They'll never know the difference, even up close."

effects.description:
Income from all enemy buildings: -5%
	(local enemy province)

skillTree.localised_description: "Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike hard, strike true.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: As sailors, deckhands are experts in seamanship and ship operations. As pirates, they also quickly become proficient in swordplay and in using a variety of weapons.

skillTree.localised_description: In battle, Gunners oversee the banks of cannon, and on land they tend to be armed with the best pistols and other blackpowder weapons from the ship’s stores.

skillTree.localised_description: "Listen very carefully, me hearties, I shall say this only once… Quiet! Stromfels' stinkin' breath!"
The Pirate crew are drawn together by the lure of the sea as well as the lure of plunder.

skillTree.localised_description: "Now listen up an' listen good… here be the plan…"
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
The only law worth noting in Sartosa is the so-called “Pirate's Code”. It stresses both personal freedom and loyalty to your captain, crew, and ship (in that order).
This one has survived calamities and wounds uncounted, although they may have lost a few bits and pieces of themselves along the way.
If it's not tacked down, this one'll 'ave it and kill anyone who gets in their way.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: "You'll never find such a crew - villainous scum, the lot of 'em. I certainly wouldn't want to be facing 'em in the thick of battle!"

Leadership: +2 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 when fighting at sea
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There's a time in every sailor's, er, life when the black flag seems like the best, if not the only option.
"The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Take care of your ship and she will have a care for your wellbeing in return.
Such things keep the eternal players' of this world alive.
Beware those who sail under the black flag - they give no quarter and never, ever give up the chase.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Beautiful and innocent it may be, but all will be consumed by fire in the end. It is written.

effects.description:
Weakness to Fire Damage: -30%
	(enemy armies in local region)

Attrition: +10% when under siege
	(enemy armies in local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: How else is an ordinary, decent pirate to make an honest living in these hard, dark times?

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -8 when enemy lays siege or encircles
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Killing is at the forefront of this one's mind. Hopefully, they also know how to run a ship.
It takes more than mere muscle to be leader, you must also know how to make money and how to inflict pain - a lot of pain.
There's nothing quite like a good, straightforward plan - and this is nothing like one! Complexity rarely trumps simplicity, in all matters.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment for melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Be the cargo powder, steel, gold or flesh, in the final analysis it matters not.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +15%

Campaign movement range: +10%
	(when in enemy or razed territory)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!
"If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
